title: Treasury Secretary Yellen, other finance leaders urge to boost fight against global food insecurity - PBS NewsHour
content: Treasury Secretary Yellen, other finance leaders urge to boost fight against global food insecurity  PBS NewsHour
description: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen has urged world finance leaders to "get concrete" as they look for ways to combat a looming crisis over food insecurity around the global that Russia's war in Ukraine has made worse.
